lead_paragraph: TEAM In England, Mike Ashley, the embattled owner of Newcastle United, said Sunday that he had put the club up for sale. Ashley bought the club last year for $235.9 million, but he has been through two managers — Sam Allardyce and Kevin Keegan — and the club has won only one of its first four games in the Premier League this season.
